name: The Dull Phoenix
description:
The Dull Phoenix is a choose your own adventure game where you live a life in the near future. The human race has advanced so far that brain implants and body manipulation is common. You work at a bio-tech company that is experimenting with an implant that would give the user immortality. Would you take it? Should you?

Instructions:

Read through the event text on the top of the screen and make a decision by clicking the button of your choice. Each action will affect the outcome so choose wisely! At any time, press the Escape button on your keyboard to exit the game.
